Libraries
System

Library containing functions to interact with the system

Functions
ccpm

Calls the Operating System

Parameters
cl

System Call Number

dl or dx

Parameter

ds:dx

Address

Returns
al or ax

Return Value

es:ax

Return Address

bx

Same as ax

cx

Error Code

Preserved Registers

  • si, di, bp, sp, ss, ds, cs

  • es, when not used to hold a return segment value
